body_html:
I don't have it handy, but the gradient error didn't appear TPU related: it was a warning from the optimizer that there were no gradients to the weight variables.

Looking at it, my guess is that in my reproduction the try: ... except: continue block failed to execute and so the loss was a constant zero. If you don't see the error in the CPU execution then it's probably fine.
body_text:
I don't have it handy, but the gradient error didn't appear TPU related: it was a warning from the optimizer that there were no gradients to the weight variables.
Looking at it, my guess is that in my reproduction the try: ... except: continue block failed to execute and so the loss was a constant zero.  If you don't see the error in the CPU execution then it's probably fine.
body:
I don't have it handy, but the gradient error didn't appear TPU related: it was a warning from the optimizer that there were no gradients to the weight variables.  

Looking at it, my guess is that in my reproduction the `try: ... except: continue` block failed to execute and so the loss was a constant zero.  If you don't see the error in the CPU execution then it's probably fine.
